scripts.db:setup:dev: npm run db:create:dev && npm run db:migrate:dev && npm run db:seed:dev
scripts.db:setup:test: npm run db:create:test && npm run db:migrate:test && npm run db:seed:test
scripts.db:setup:prod: npm run db:create:prod && npm run db:migrate:prod && npm run db:seed:prod
scripts.db:reset:dev: npm run db:drop:dev && npm run db:setup:dev
scripts.db:reset:test: npm run db:drop:test && npm run db:setup:test
scripts.db:reset:prod: npm run db:drop:prod && npm run db:setup:prod
scripts.db:create:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sequelize-cli db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_general_ci
scripts.db:create:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize-cli db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_general_ci
scripts.db:create:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sequelize-cli db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_general_ci
